author: Erin Somerville
title: A century ago, NSW cut ties with Victoria to curb another deadly pandemic
description: Closing the border amid the COVID-19 emergency would be seen as a blow to the twin cities of Albury and Wodonga — but it wouldn't be the first time a virus had split them in two.
content:
Posted 
March 24, 2020 18:27:22
The twin cities of Albury and Wodonga share a number of services despite being split into separate local government areas and states by the Murray River.
Kevin Mack, the Mayor of Albury, says this special relationship means … [+5359 chars]
